title: Download Speed
body:
I am a fairly new player to League and there is a problem with downloading the game itself. Once in the LoL client, the average download speed of the game is at a steady 500 KB/S. When checking task manager, it shows that the LoL client is using around 3 to 4 MB/S. 


I have already Tried

* Running it as admin

* Allowing it through my firewall

* Disabling my firewall

Any advice/fixes?

replies.body:
Next step I can think of after all those is to make sure your permissions settings aren't limiting anything as well.

Got a guide for you with some steps to try out [**right over here**](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ)! Give it a shot if you're still seeing slower download speeds and let me know if they help out at all!
